text: Robert Byrd Jordan III (October 11, 1932 â€“ February 16, 2020) was an American politician. He was the 29th Lieutenant Governor of North Carolina for one term from 1985 through 1989 under Governor James G. Martin. He ran for Governor of North Carolina in 1988 but didn't win. ==References== ==Other websites== *NC Notable Bob Jordan *North Carolina Award citation *OurCampaigns.com *Jordan elected chairman of NCSU trustees Category:Lieutenant Governors of North Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:2020 deaths Category:1932 births
title: Robert B. Jordan
